metadata.name: Researcher Web Search Quality
metadata.description: Evaluates researcher agent's ability to effectively use web search and synthesize results

testCase.userPrompt: Find information about the latest developments in quantum computing and summarize the key breakthroughs.

results.title: IBM Achieves Quantum Computing Milestone
results.snippet: IBM's latest quantum processor demonstrates error correction breakthrough, achieving 1000+ qubit system with significantly reduced error rates.

results.title: Google's Quantum Supremacy Update
results.snippet: Google researchers publish new findings on quantum advantage in optimization problems, showing practical applications in logistics and drug discovery.

results.title: Quantum Computing Market Analysis 2024
results.snippet: The quantum computing market expected to reach $5 billion by 2027. Major players include IBM, Google, Microsoft, and emerging startups.

requiredElements.value: discusses error correction, qubit systems, or quantum advantage

requiredElements.description: References major companies in the space
requiredElements.value: mentions IBM, Google, or other quantum computing companies

requiredElements.description: Synthesizes information rather than just listing
requiredElements.value: provides a coherent summary connecting multiple points

optionalElements.value: discusses real-world applications like optimization or drug discovery
discusses market growth, future potential, or timeline
